name: fanSpeedLevel_setValue
description: This function is used to set the fan speed level of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the fan speed level.

parameters.name: fanSpeedLevel
parameters.description: The numeric level to set for the fan speed.
